title: Introduction to JavaScript and Reactjs
subTitle1Content: Master JavaScript basics, ES6+ features, and essential programming concepts.
subTitle2Content: Learn React components, JSX, state, props, and the basics of building a dynamic UI.

title: Backend Development with Node.js and Express.js
subTitle1Content: Understand the fundamentals of Node.js, including modules, file handling, and event-driven programming..
subTitle2Content: Learn to build server-side applications using Express.js, including routing and middleware..

title: Database Integration with Mongo db
subTitle1Content: Learn the basics of MongoDB, including collections, documents, and CRUD operations.
subTitle2Content: Integrate MongoDB with Node.js applications using Mongoose ORM.

title: Frontent Integration
subTitle1Content: Integrate frontend designs using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap frameworks
subTitle2Content: Learn how to use Vue.js to enhance interactivity in Laravel projects.

title: Advance Features
subTitle1Content: Use Laravel queues and jobs to handle asynchronous tasks.
subTitle2Content: Learn how to test and debug your Laravel applications.

title: Deployement and Final Project
subTitle1Content: Deploy your Laravel applications to live servers..
subTitle2Content: Build and present a complete Laravel-based application as your final project.
